text:
I don’t know any other way tbh, which is why I stopped using clawdbot after a couple of days. Back to vanilla Claude code now. To use clawdbot the way I’d want to, it’d probably take a 1k a month, it eats tokens like crazy

And Im using hetzners cheapest vps, doesn’t matter.
Clawdbot's hype is wild—70k stars in 3 months is insane—but those security holes are scary. Need better agent reputation standards ASAP.

Moltbot (전 Clawdbot) 제작자: "나는 읽지 않은 코드를 배포한다"
